scripts.zip: rm -f rules-lambda.zip && yarn install && zip -r rules-lambda.zip index.js src node_modules package.json yarn.lock
scripts.update:faas:prod: aws lambda update-function-code --function-name rules-lambda-prod --zip-file fileb://$(pwd)/rules-lambda.zip --region us-east-1 --query 'LastModified'
scripts.update:faas:qa: aws lambda update-function-code --function-name rules-lambda-qa --zip-file fileb://$(pwd)/rules-lambda.zip --region us-east-1 --query 'LastModified'
scripts.update:faas:dev: aws lambda update-function-code --function-name rules-lambda-dev --zip-file fileb://$(pwd)/rules-lambda.zip --region us-east-1 --query 'LastModified'
scripts.deploy:prod: yarn run zip && yarn run update:faas:prod
scripts.deploy:qa: yarn run zip && yarn run update:faas:qa
scripts.deploy:dev: yarn run zip && yarn run update:faas:dev
